meaning_str.bing:
n. 地下；地铁；地下组织；先锋运动
adj. 地下的；隐蔽的；先锋派的；地下组织的
adv. 在地下；不公开地
网络. 秘密的；地下铁；地下狂飙

地下；地铁；地下组织；先锋运动
地下的；隐蔽的；先锋派的；地下组织的
秘密的；地下铁；地下狂飙

在地下；地道内；地底下；转入地下；密密地；隐蔽地；隐匿地
地下的；地底下的；秘密的；暗中的；非法的；地铁的；地下铁道的；先锋派的；非主流的；另类的
地铁；地下组织；秘密组织；地下活动；地下运动；地下文化；非主流文化

1.en: As he rises int he underground circuit, he lands int he middle of a match between his boss and a crooked cop.
1.cn: 当他在地下圈内蒸蒸日上时，他处在了老闆和一个不正派警察之间的竞赛中。

2.en: Mr Morgan, whose company runs three London Underground lines, said: "The only privilege I have is the best view. "
2.cn: 他表示：“我拥有唯一的特权就是视野最好。”他的公司经营着伦敦地铁公司（LondonUnderground）的3条地铁线路。

3.en: He was the first man to ride up in that Phoenix capsule and reach the surface after more than two months underground.
3.cn: 他是被困井下超过两个月之后，第一个乘坐凤凰号救生舱升井的矿工。

0.en: You made it! You spent years underground in obscurity, shedding blood, sweat, tears, and your internal organs.
0.cn: 你成功了！你在地下默默无闻了那么多年，流血，流汗，流泪，失去五脏六腑。

1.en: Someone or someones tried to make my wife and I lose the election by keeping us underground today. And I would like to know what you know about that.
1.cn: 某个人或者某些人今天想把我和我夫人困在地下好让我们输掉大选。我想知道你对此有什么了解。

2.en: What do you mean? It's not an underground network. John. It's an underground network.
2.cn: 你的意思是? 不是地下网络，约翰，是地下网络。

3.en: Makes me wonder if it might be related to our underground friends.
3.cn: 让我怀疑是不是跟那几位地下朋友有关。

4.en: I will find your underground terror cell, Mycroft. Just put me back in London.
4.cn: 我会找出你所谓的地下恐怖组织的麦克罗夫特，只需将我放归伦敦。

5.en: The expansion of our underground gas-pipeline system was fast-tracked just to keep up.
5.cn: 我们地下的煤气管道系统扩张发展迅速,紧跟时代。

6.en: According to Mycroft, there's an underground network planning an attack on London. That's all we know.
6.cn: 麦克罗夫特说的，地下网络要袭击伦敦，就这点消息。

7.en: Any idea who they are, this underground network? Intelligence must have a list of the most obvious ones.
7.cn: 谁的地下网络，你有头绪吗? 情报局一定有重点嫌疑名单。

8.en: Let me ask you something. What is the main reason you were all forced underground? Ignorance. Perception.
8.cn: 让我问问你们。你们被迫转入地下的主要原因是什么？无知。视野。

9.en: There were armed men in the basement of the exchange, a massive firefight six stories underground. Sameen was shot.
9.cn: 交易所的地下室设有重兵，负六层一场激战，萨姆恩中弹。

10.en: Mr. Bull is the boss. Mr. Bull, where's all that water coming from? It's coming from a broken water pipe underground.
10.cn: 公牛先生是他们的老板。公牛先生，请问这些水都是从哪里来的？这些水都是从地底下的一根破裂的水管里喷出来的。

11.en: You've been underground a long time, Madam Coin. This isn't like the rest of Panem Support for the Capitol runs deep here.
11.cn: 你隐居幕后太久了，柯茵夫人，这里和施惠国其他地方不一样，这里的人只会听从国会区的指令。

12.en: You know actually, it does have a very interesting history. This street is the first street in the city to have an underground sewer system.
12.cn: 事实上这个地区的历史非常有趣，这条街是纽约第一条有下水道系统的街道。

13.en: It's tough to say since it's hot, but on the underground market, my guy figures…Your guy Eddie Crispo? Yes. He figures ten, maybe 15 thousand.
13.cn: 这么抢手的东西很难估价，不过在黑市里，我朋友估价……你是指艾迪·克里斯波吧？是滴，他估价一万到一万五。

14.en: Rest assured, Mycroft, whatever this underground network of yours is up to, the secret will reside in something seemingly insignificant or bizarre.
14.cn: 放心好了 麦克罗夫特，不论你这个地下网络打算做什么，秘密就藏在某些不起眼的小古怪中。

15.en: Well, Evelyn did a cost-benefit analysis comparing all your last five years of crime fighting before going underground. And Elastigirl's numbers are self-explanatory.
15.cn: 伊芙琳做了一个收益和损耗的分析对比了你们在转入地下前的五年里所有打击犯罪的行动。弹力女超人的出色成绩不言而喻。

16.en: He loved that, showed it off to everyone. He was heartbroken when you were all forced to go underground. Father believed the world would be more dangerous without you.
16.cn: 他特别喜欢，还展示给所有人看。当你们被迫转入地下的时候他特别难过。父亲觉得没有了你们世界会变得更加危险。

17.en: If superheroes had not been forced underground, it never would've happened. Or Dad could've taken Mom to the safe room as soon as he knew there was trouble. I disagree strongly! But we're not going into it right now.
17.cn: 要是超级英雄没有被迫转入地下这一切就不会发生。或者爸爸在危险发生时尽快带着妈妈躲进安全屋。我强烈反对你的说法！不过我们现在就不争这件事了。
